name: MyTemple: The Fitness Training Game
blurb: My Temple is the world's first truly all-inclusive Personal Training Game for the iPhone/iOS.

rewards.reward: Contribute at the ten-dollar level (or any level for that matter) and when the game is done, you get a copy. Simple enough. Contributors will also get access to a private MY TEMPLE message board.
Contribute at this level and you\u2019ll receive a unique in-game ARENA BATTLE ITEM to give you the edge over your frienemies. You\u2019ll also receive all of the ten-dollar incentives. Score!
Give us fifty clams and we\u2019ll give you a shirt! Or poster. As well as all of the twenty five-dollar incentives AND a copy of the game.
Can\u2019t decide between a poster or a shirt? Contribute seventy dollars and we\u2019ll give you both! Not to mention a copy of the game and a unique arena item. Mega-score!

At the eighty-dollar level, contributors can look forward to seeing their names in the game\u2019s credits, as well as a unique \u201cCornerstone\u201d Facebook trophy to commemorate their generosity. In case you haven\u2019t guessed the pattern yet, you\u2019ll also receive all of the seventy-dollar incentives, and, as ever, a free copy of the game.

Those flashing BENJAMINS are entitled to special, limited-run signed prints of Gabo\u2019s lush and astounding original game art. You\u2019ll also get all of the eighty-dollar incentives and your own copy of\u2026wait for it\u2026the game! Ultra-mega-score-itude!

Have trouble staying motivated? NOT ANYMORE. You just bought yourself a two hundred fifty-dollar set of My Temple-branded exercise wear, so get out there and get \u2018em all sweaty and horrible! You\u2019ll also receive all of the hundred-dollar rewards and a copy of the game.

At the four-hundred dollar level, you\u2019ll be invited to help Michael, Cody and Gabo conceive a My Temple complex addition of your very own to be included in the game. Naturally, you\u2019ll need a free copy of the game in order to festoon your temple with your namesake, and equally naturally, you\u2019ll also snag all the hundred-dollar incentives.

Shell out half a grand (plus change) and we\u2019ll hit you with a Gabo-drawn portrait of yourself surrounded by My Temple creatures. You\u2019ll also be invited to help design one of the DEADLY ARENA TRAPS that thousands of players will have to traverse in their struggle towards physical perfection. Add in a free copy of the game and all of the hundred-dollar incentives, and you\u2019ve got yourself what we in the business call a super-ultra-mega-score-athon 9000!

A thousand dollars puts you quite literally into the world of My Temple, as a Gabo-drawn NPC whom characters will interact with or get missions from within the game. Contributors at this level also receive all two hundred fifty-dollar incentives and a free copy of the game to do with as they please (we suggest playing it!).

This is your chance to fly out to Los Angeles and meet Michael, Cody, and special guests! Talk comedy, fitness, apps, or just enjoy a free lunch at a swanky spot and stare deeply into their eyes. You\u2019re the one that paid four grand; DO WHAT YOU WANT WITH THEM. We insist. You\u2019ll also receive all two hundred fifty-dollar incentives, a copy of the game, and no less than two high fives.

Fund 4/30 of the game and we\u2019ll fly you out for a private release party as well as put every single other incentive listed in your sweaty little hands, EXCEPT, paradoxically, a free copy of the game. You\u2019re rich; pay the $2.99, cheapskate.
